price: 126. À Allah appartient ce qu’il y a dans les cieux et sur terre. Et, de par Son savoir, Allah Cerne Toute chose.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّحِيطٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wakāna al-lahu bikulli shayin muḥīṭan
